SEARCH

Package org.lwjgl.util.par

@NonnullDefault package org.lwjgl.util.par
Contains bindings to the par library.
  • Class
    Description
    ParOctasphere
    Bindings to par_octasphere.h, a tiny malloc-free library that generates triangle meshes for spheres, rounded boxes, and capsules.
    ParOctasphereConfig
    Layout
    ParOctasphereConfig.Buffer
    An array of ParOctasphereConfig structs.
    ParOctasphereMesh
    Layout
    ParOctasphereMesh.Buffer
    An array of ParOctasphereMesh structs.
    ParShapes
    Bindings to par_shapes.h, a simple C library for creation and manipulation of triangle meshes.
    ParShapesMesh
    The par_shapes.h mesh structure.
    ParShapesMesh.Buffer
    An array of ParShapesMesh structs.
    ParShapesRandFn
    Instances of this class may be passed to the create_lsystem method.
    ParShapesRandFnI
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the create_lsystem method.
    ParSLAdvectionCallback
    Instances of this class may be passed to the mesh_from_streamlines method.
    ParSLAdvectionCallbackI
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the mesh_from_streamlines method.
    ParSLAnnotation
    Layout for generated vertex attributes.
    ParSLAnnotation.Buffer
    An array of ParSLAnnotation structs.
    ParSLConfig
    Immutable configuration for a streamlines context.
    ParSLConfig.Buffer
    An array of ParSLConfig structs.
    ParSLMesh
    Triangle mesh generated by the library.
    ParSLMesh.Buffer
    An array of ParSLMesh structs.
    ParSLPosition
    The simple two-tuple math type used for mesh and spine vertices.
    ParSLPosition.Buffer
    An array of ParSLPosition structs.
    ParSLSpineList
    Client-owned list of line strips that will be tessellated.
    ParSLSpineList.Buffer
    An array of ParSLSpineList structs.
    ParSLViewport
    Viewport for streamline seed placement.
    ParSLViewport.Buffer
    An array of ParSLViewport structs.
    ParStreamlines
    Bindings to par_streamlines.h, a single-file, zero-dependency, C99 library that can triangulate wide lines and curves.
